§8§oJoel Friedman§r

§72010§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oThis paper was been withdrawn by the author due to a crucial error in thinking that it is immediate that the vanishing of rho kernels of a direct sum of sheaves is equivalent to the individual vanishing. A corrected
version of the proof is available as \
,which gives a proof without sheaf theory (really translating the sheaf theory to combinatorics). A sequel to this paper, \
is in preparation; this will develop sheaf theory and give a simpleproof of the conjecture (simple assuming the sheaf theory is in place).\u00a7r
